      • createFolders

        public static String createFolders(String... paths)
        create multi-level directory
        Example use: createFolders("/", "Users", "Power", "Main");
        Parameters:
        paths - must be at least 1 element is root folder (Optional) the folder that want to created.
        Returns:
        String the created directory path or empty string if something error
